sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"create-a-npm-package"}}>{`Create a NPM Package`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"how-to-sign-up"}}>{`How to Sign Up`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Sign up on npmjs.com`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`npm login`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Create package.json`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Test`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Publish`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Within your project, ensure you .gitignore node_modules.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If your program depends on another package, ensure you compile it on the local machine.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`On the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm`}</MDXTag>{` website, you need to login. Ensure you complete the form! Your email will also be shown with all the packages.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"once-youve-signed-up"}}>{`Once you've signed up`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm login`}</MDXTag>{` to be able to login.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`When you're inside the folder, ensure that you npm init.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Entry point will be the main file in the project.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you have want to test this, you can use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm install /path/to/package/`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
